rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 34 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:26 PM, 01 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Batangas, Laguna, Quezon, Metro Manila, Rizal, Tarlac, Bulacan and Pampanga within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Botolan) and Cavite(Dasmarinas) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
